backend/main.mo: Main actor defining storage, access control, maps, activity tracking, and data types for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, and likes.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module providing a run function that transforms old actor state into the new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting alphanumeric pond name validation and related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files detailing layout, pages, components, and behaviors.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the frontend app and setting metadata, favicon, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, and all application routes.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button that uses bookmark state hooks and prevents navigation when clicked.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a comment item component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file for emoji reactions component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and a copyright line referencing caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header handling search, navigation, user avatar, dropdowns, and mobile interactions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout combining header, footer, sidebar drawer, and route outlet with auto-closing drawer on navigation.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Left sidebar with navigation links and recent activity list, highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: React card displaying a post with avatar, metadata, image handling, like/share actions, and pond/user info.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer component that toggles a left sidebar with body scroll lock and animated overlay.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave functionality with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header showing pond banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation for feed/about.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a post display component.
Empty placeholder file for an emoji tray component.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a reply (ribbit) with avatar, content, likes, nested depth indentation, and reply form handling.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full-screen mobile search modal showing trending searches and suggestions, handling input, selection, and submission.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under a search bar showing trending searches or suggestions based on the query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar displaying top, trending, and newest tags using reusable tag stats modules.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrapper components for tab lists and triggers with underline-based classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions to toggle or modify bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, state management, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Evaluates a media query and updates the result on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for interacting with the backend actor to fetch and mutate ponds, profiles, searches, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers, theme color variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notation like k, M, and B with one decimal precision.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides functions to validate, normalize, and error‑check pond names using strict alphanumeric rules.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Implements lily sharing via Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks plus toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity, Froggy Phrase backup/restore, and localStorage settings with simple hashing and obfuscation.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Tracks per‑lily view cooldowns in localStorage to prevent repeated increments within five minutes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with platform description, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with loading states, membership badges, and links to individual pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Page for creating a new lily with text, image, or link, including pond selection, tag suggestions, and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a new pond with name validation, description, froggy phrase check, and optional banner/profile images.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage displaying trending or new lilies, supporting search and loading states with sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with comments, likes, view tracking, and image lightbox support.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond information including moderators, visibility, images, and allows leaving the pond.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Page showing a pond’s feed, joining logic, and lily sorting, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Displays locally bookmarked lilies with loading, missing-post handling, and removal support.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Tag hub showing top, trending, and newest tags with tabbed browsing and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with canonical redirect handling and sorting options.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: User settings for username management, avatar upload, security phrase, joined ponds, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration including theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, feature requests, and pending alphanumeric validation requirements.
